Summary: Me and my pregnant fiance were walking down a road when multiple large unknown orbs shot and darted in the sky followed by a terrifying sound.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hoopeston
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsit was july afternoon when i had been arguing with my father things got heated so me and my fiance had decided to go and take a walk to calm things down a little bit. we started walking down our country road and we were talking to each other trying to pass the time as we walked down the long country road. we had decided walk to my fiances parents house. it was a six mile walk so we took about 3, 15minute breaks. and about halfway there we had noticed that it had started to get dark out so we tried to hurry up before it got dark. we had tried to pass time by finding star formations like the big dipper and orion and orions belt. it was pretty dark and everything silent and still and there had not been any traffic at that point. as my fiance walked i still stared at the stars both not speaking just walking at that moment i had noticed a large orange\red light that blinked itself into existance thinking nothing nothing of it i was about to look away when out of nowere in a curved line. more orbs one by one apeared one after the other until there was a total of five, shock instantly filled me. at that moment i knew it wasnt no airlplain! i shouted for my fiance to look at the objects in the sky and the objects seemed to be hovering there not moving. she didnt like what she saw and wanted to leave quickly and at that time i was still watching the objects in the sky. she was a little scared at what she saw and started to walk at a fast pace to hurry and get to her parents house. as i looked up again the strange orbs instantly shot and darted around each other, one shot instanly from left to right without hesitation then vanished. i hurried down the road almost to my destination trying to calm my fiance down. at this time there was still no sound it was unnatuarally quiet. i looked to see if the lights were still there but they vanished, then out of nowere an extremly lound unatural skreech that sounded like it was right next to my head which made me and my fiance stop dead in our tracks and every hair in my body stood srait up at that time we were both frightened i looked around but didnt see anything but we started to run quickly to her parents house at that time we were almost there and still didnt see anything and then we finally made it there.it left us with an uneasy feeling.
